testcase.name: Send Email by Select Menu Email Handling from Invoice System then Generate Email Handling
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Invoice System"......................................passed And Select Menu "Email Handling"............................................passed And Select Email handling "Email tidak terdaftar"...........................passed And Type EmailClient on "Alamat Email yang digunakan client" with value "vincent.putra07@homecredit.co.id".passed And Click button "Generate Email"...........................................passed And Verify Email Handling...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
